title: When does the worlds skins get available in the store?
body: Does anyone know when they get available? Im talking about the skt skins, ssw skins etc. The exact date/patch?

replies.body: the e sports skins will probably go on sale in like late September, around when worlds starts.
I feel for you dude.. I missed valentine day Lucian because I was taking a break to train my puppy :(

It's a bit unfortunate, but it looks like you *just* missed those SKT skins =\ . They were recently in our store on 7/5 and for about 2 weeks afterwards, but they're currently not available. It'd be good to periodically check out the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to make sure you don't miss the next sale!
